|brand = Synology |model = DiskStation DS101 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = REV 3.0 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = DS101 |page_start_date = 13 June 2024 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.wi-cat.ru/Synology_Disk_Station_DS-101 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = NAS |sernum = 4CD1N |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Intel XScale;IXP420BB; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 266 <!-- 266 / 400 / 533 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = M-Systems;MD2811-D16-V3Q18; |flash1size = 16 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 64 |ram1chip = Nanya;NT5SV16M16BS-75B; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Kendin;KS8721B; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:11:32
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = RedBoot;Synology; |stockos = Linux;2.4.22-uc0;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, IDE |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 3 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = 1 |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 3.33 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.1 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|jtag = yes,, 8-pin header,, unpopulated,, J1 |serial = yes,, 6-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = RTC w/ battery, buzzer |addchip = I2C Real Time Clock;Ricoh;RS5C372A;;1;,,, IDE Controller;Acard;ATP865;;1;,,, 4-Port USB 2.0 Host Controller;VIA;VT6212L;;1;,,, Dual-Channel Power Distribution Switch;Microchip;MIC2026-1BM;;2;,,, Programmable High Density PLD;Lattice Semiconductor;LC4032V;;1;,,, Programmable Spread Spectrum Clock Generator;Cypress;CY25100;;2;,,, 5A Low Dropout Positive Adjustable Regulator;Analog Integrations;AIC1084;;2;,,, 150Khz, 3A PWM Buck DC/DC Converter;Analog Integrations;AIC1501;;2;,,, 30V, 8A P-Channel Power MOSFET;Advanced Power Electronics;AP4435M;;1;,,, Hex Schmitt-Trigger Inverter;TI;SN74LVC14A;;1;, |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = acquired via DHCP |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 10/2004 |estprice = 210 |upc = 846504000005 |ean = 4711174720002 |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Taiwan
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "Synology™ DS-101" and "REV 3.0" are silk-screened on the main board.
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Intel XScale]] IXP420BB @266MHz ARM *Storage: 16MB DiskOnChip Flash, 1x IDE HDD *Memory: 64MB SDRAM *Network: 1x Fast Ethernet port *USB: 3x USB 2.0 ports *Power: 12V/3.33A via barrel
==Links of Interest== *[https://www.smallnetbuilder.com/nas/nas-reviews/reviewds101/ ''Synology Disk Station'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] *[https://web.archive.org/web/20120504124049/http://www.nslu2-linux.org/wiki/DS101/HomePage ''DS101 Home Page'' on ''' NSLU2-Linux''']
==Pictures== <center>'''User Images''' <gallery mode="slideshow"> File:Synology Disk Station DS-101 Top.jpeg|Board Top File:Synology Disk Station DS-101 Bottom.jpeg|Board Bottom </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]]
==See also== :• [[Synology DiskStation Devices]] • [[List of NAS Devices]] • [https://oinkzwurgl.org/attic/diskstation/diskstation_hardware/ Hardware] *[[Synology DiskStation DS414]] - 4-Bays NAS (2x GbE LAN) :CPU: [[Marvell]] ''Armada XP'' MV78230 @1.33GHz Dual Core, 1GB DDR3 *[[Synology DiskStation DS414j]] - 4-Bays NAS (1x GbE LAN) :CPU: [[Mindspeed]] ''Comcerto'' 2000 @1.2GHz Dual Core, 512MB DDR3 *[[Synology DiskStation DS414slim]] - 4-Bays NAS (2x GbE LAN) :CPU: [[Marvell]] ''Armada 370'' @1.2GHz, 512MB DDR3 *[[Synology DiskStation DS415+]] - 4-Bays NAS (2x GbE LAN) :CPU: [[Intel Atom]] C2538 @2.4GHz Quad Core, 2GB DDR3 *[[Synology DiskStation DS415play]] - 4-Bays NAS • [http://www.3dnews.ru/905027 Review] :CPU: [[Intel Atom]] @1.6GHz, 1GB DDR3, 1080p
